casebody.data:
EASTWAY WRECKER SERVICE
v.
CHARLOTTE. No. 467A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2005. T. LaFontine Odom, Sr., Thomas L. Odom, Jr., for Eastway Wrecker Service. S. Jujeeb Shah-Khan, Charlotte, Assistant City Attorney, for City of Charlotte.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of June 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (City of Charlotte) shall have up to and including the 25th day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of June 2005."
